content: stitches of the round pull and fasten close the bottom of the body weave in ends tentacles join the yarn with a slip_stitch to any of the front loop stitches created on round 19 tentacles will be worked around every 4th front loop of the 19th round leg 1 chain 32 3hdc into 2nd chain from the hook 3hdc in each stitch to the end this will create a natural spiral leg 2 skip 2 front loops and slip_stitch into 3rd front loop from the last leg chain 30 3hdc into 2nd chain from the hook 3hdc into each stitch to the end leg 3 skip 2 front loops and slip_stitch into 3rd front loop from the last leg chain 32 3hdc into the 2nd chain from the hook 3hdc into each stitch from the end leg 4-7 repeat leg 2 and leg 3 two times leg 8 repeat leg 2 slip_stitch into starting stitch of first leg finish and weave in ends work each leg into a neat spiral face details use tapestry needle and contrasting color to add facial features have fun with experimenting with different faces and expressions ©twinknit creations do not reproduce duplicate redistribute or sell this pattern without consent sale of products made using this pattern is permitted please credit twinknit creations published may 2023
